name: Spindrift (unfinished)
description:
A genshin impact fangame I am working on...

Well, not your typical genshin fangame...Because you aren't fighting enemies this time round. Instead...

Eula woke up on a beach to see that Mondstadt had changed, drastically...while suffering from amnesia after an unknown incident. And now, she had to find a way, to escape, and seek help in her forgotten vengeance...

Project started at April 29, before Sumeru is released...

No offence...to those involved. Contains: lots of ooc and well...
